title: International Relations and Global Governance

vocab.definition: Theory emphasizing anarchic international system and power competition
Theory highlighting cooperation through international institutions
Multiple channels of connection creating mutual vulnerability
Theory that dominant power provides stability to international system
Principle that sovereignty includes duty to protect populations

teachingNotes: Explore competing theories of international relations. Analyze contemporary challenges to global governance.

sample.question: What theory emphasizes anarchic system and power competition?

truefalse.question: Liberal institutionalism highlights cooperation through international institutions.

multiplechoice.question: What describes multiple channels creating mutual vulnerability?

fillintheblank.question: ________ stability theory says dominant power provides international stability.

shortanswer.question: How does responsibility to protect challenge traditional sovereignty?
